content:
I am a final-year undergraduate student at Tsinghua University, majoring in Electronic Engineering and double-majoring in Economics.
Currently I work in Professor Gao Huang’s lab for interesting topics in Resource-Efficient Deep Learning. I interned at Baidu Robotics and Auto-driving Lab since Spring 2019, advised by Professor Ruigang Yang. Before that, I was a research intern at DKI Group of Microsoft Research Asia in 2018-2019, advised by Qingwei Lin.
I am visiting IFP Group at UIUC since july 2019, advised by Professor Thomas S. Huang and Professor Humphrey H. Shi.

title: Hao Li (李豪)
Improved Techniques for Training Adaptive Deep Networks
Outage Prediction and Diagnosis for Cloud Service Systems
